entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leader
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Leader Airport 2:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.3°C
Wind: E 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
